meta.name: Selectively Reduce Motion
meta.tagline: Allows you to selectively change reduced motion settings
meta.description: Turning a setting on means motion will be reduced for that feature, by default this extension does nothing.
meta.changelog:
1.5: Allow disabling motion for lottie icon buttons
1.4: allow disabling motion for nameplates
1.3: allow disabling motion for message confetti
1.2: allow disabling motion for scrolling animations
1.1: allow disabling motion for super reactions
1.0: reduced the motions

iconButtons.description: All buttons that play animations when you hover them (e.g. mute/defean, sticker picker, gift button)

scrolling.description: Includes "Jump to Present" button and Page Up/Down keys. Does not include smooth scrolling with the scroll wheel. For disabling scroll wheel animations use the "No Smooth Scrolling" extension.
